--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@E...> 
> I hadn't thought of it before, but the sukashi openings in this one 
combined with the hammering of the plate reminds me of Shoami 
Shigenobu's plate work.  I don't know if there is any relationship 
there.  I can't think of any heianjo-type brass inlay work by 
Shigenobu.
> 
> Jim

Don't know if it's relevant, but I've seen lots of
gomoku zogan type work on Shigenobu plates.

Rich S
